summary.p: From Kappen-Hans, he knows that Bullinger intends to come [to Kappel] in the following week; he himself will be in Zurich on Wednesday, so it would be best for Bullinger to come on Monday or then in the following week.

div.p: Dear godfather, Kappen Hans told me that you intend to come this week, which makes me very happy. However, I am quite sure that you will not come before Tuesday. Therefore, I inform you that I will ride to Zurich on Wednesday, if it is God's will. So, if you also intend to come then, postpone it to the following week or come on Monday.
Dated at Kappel, Saturday before St. Andrew's Day 1535.
To the well-learned, honorable Master Heinrich Bullinger, preacher in Zurich, my dear godfather.
